definitions.definition: One who follows a philosophical belief in a naked , natural life and prefers to live without clothes , often for reasons of ecology , health , religious belief, and/or ethical concerns .
One who believes in the doctrine of naturism , which attributes everything to nature.

main_definition: One who follows a philosophical belief in a naked , natural life and prefers to live without clothes , often for reasons of ecology , health , religious belief, and/or ethical concerns .
secondary_definitions: One who believes in the doctrine of naturism , which attributes everything to nature.
